"The Reward Box":
"The Reward Box is a system that lets you obtain items by spending Reward Box Medals.

Reward Box Medals can be obtained by completing Limited-Time Tasks."
"To access the Reward Box, open the Main Menu, select <yellow>Tasks/Quest<c>, then select <yellow>Reward Box<c>."
"Items obtained from the Reward Box, as well as leftover Medals, can be exchanged for other items at the <yellow>Item Recycling<c>."
